summary.span: Performs binary or text string comparison when given two strings.

span.span: Performs binary or text string comparison when given two strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持 Visual Basic 编译器，不应在代码中直接使用。This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 当 Visual Basic 相等运算符用于比较两个字符串时，它会将这两个字符串以及 参数的 `False` 值传递到 `TextCompare` 方法。When the Visual Basic equality operator is used to compare two strings, it passes the strings to the method along with a value of `False` for the `TextCompare` argument. 这执行区分大小写的比较，序号或基于当前区域性，具体取决于语句的值。This performs a case-sensitive comparison that is either ordinal or based on the current culture, depending on the value of the statement.

public: static System::Object ^ XorObject(System::Object ^ Left, System::Object ^ Right);
static member XorObject : obj * obj -> obj

summary.span: Represents the Visual Basic operator.

returns.span: A or numeric value.
For a comparison, the return value is the logical exclusion (exclusive logical disjunction) of two values.

span.span: For a comparison, the return value is the logical exclusion (exclusive logical disjunction) of two values.

returns.span: For bitwise (numeric) operations, the return value is a numeric value that represents the bitwise exclusion (exclusive bitwise disjunction) of two numeric bit patterns.

span.span: For bitwise (numeric) operations, the return value is a numeric value that represents the bitwise exclusion (exclusive bitwise disjunction) of two numeric bit patterns.

returns.span: For more information, see [Xor Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/xor-operator.md).
